subtitle: I am Froes.
UI/UX Developer and Designer.
main.description: I am a UI/UX Developer with a degree in Computer Engineering. I'm passionate about creativity and frontend development, and I'm driven by bringing designing and coding closer by building design systems and developing well-organized CSS architectures. I have experience functioning as a UI, UX, and Visual Designer, as well as a Frontend Engineer, which gives me a diverse set of design and development skills.
